data.eml:eml: Three new species of Chromis (Teleostei, Pomacentridae) from mesophotic coral ecosystems of the Philippines

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Gabriela Arango, B., T. Pinheiro, Hudson, Rocha, Claudia, D. Greene, Brian, L. Pyle, Richard, M. Copus, Joshua, Shepherd, Bart, A. Rocha, Luiz (2019): Three new species of Chromis (Teleostei, Pomacentridae) from mesophotic coral ecosystems of the Philippines. ZooKeys 835: 1-15, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.835.27528, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.835.27528
